page.title: 12VIEWS ON STAVERTON BY-PASS
page.content: "I truly wish that there could be a by-pass that could take the traffic away from Staverton. I don't think that the proposed by-pass is a good idea because it takes traffic away from a small bit of the village only." "The foundations of the older houses in the village were not built to withstand the vibration caused by heavy traffic." "Both proposed routes will isolate the school from most of the village. I think that keeping Staverton School open is one of the most important things for the life of the whole village. I have seen villages where the school has closed and it has made them dead villages with no sound of children playing in the playground." "Much agricultural land would be lost and it would cut some farms in half."
